Title: Riebum CMS
Description: This is a CMS  developed using ASP.NET MVC 4 and Entity Framework 6 and has the following main features: multi tenancy, plugin system theming, versioning,...
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This CMS is developed using ASP.NET MVC 5 and Entity Framework 6 and has the following main features:

  • multi tenancy
  • plugin system for easy extension
  • custom themes support
  • integrated content versioning
  • multilingual content possible

The sources of this project are hosted in GitHub: https://github.com/chrfin/Riebum
